name: React Aria
key_strengths: Full WCAG AA compliance, extensive testing utilities, cross-platform

name: axe-core
key_strengths: Industry standard testing engine, wide ecosystem integration
key_weaknesses: Limited to testing only, no UI components

name: React Testing Library
key_weaknesses: React-specific, requires axe integration for full coverage

name: Chakra UI
key_strengths: Good WCAG compliance, active community, modular architecture

name: PrimeReact
key_strengths: Strong WCAG AA compliance, comprehensive component set

name: Material UI (MUI)
key_strengths: Large ecosystem, comprehensive documentation, Material Design
key_weaknesses: Accessibility not primary focus, limited testing tools

name: Lighthouse
key_strengths: Built into Chrome, Google backing, performance + accessibility
key_weaknesses: Many false positives, subset of accessibility coverage

name: Ant Design
key_strengths: Large enterprise adoption, comprehensive component library
key_weaknesses: Inconsistent ARIA support, accessibility not priority

name: React Bootstrap
key_strengths: Bootstrap heritage, large community, familiar patterns
key_weaknesses: Basic accessibility features, no testing utilities
